12800.name: Pumpkin Transformation Stick - 30-day limited period
12800.description: Dimensional item. Transformation stick that turns you into a pumpkin. Can be used for 30 days. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse. Transform Pumpkin Ghost

12814.name: Shadow Item - Gatekeeper Transformation Stick
12814.description: Allows you to transform into a Gatekeeper for 60 minutes. The transformation ends when you cancel the equip. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Transform Gatekeeper

12815.name: Red Talisman - Max CP
12815.description: Increases Max CP when equipped. Effect does not stack with additional Talismans of the same type. Shadow Item that cannot be exchanged or dropped. Red Talisman of Max CP

12816.name: Red Talisman - CP Regeneration
12816.description: Increases CP regeneration rate when equipped. Effect does not stack with additional Talismans of the same type. Shadow Item that cannot be exchanged or dropped. Red Talisman of CP Regeneration

12817.name: Yellow Talisman - Increase Force
12817.description: Increases your Force Level when attacked while equipped. Effect does not stack with additional Talismans of the same type. Shadow Item that cannot be exchanged or dropped. Yellow Talisman of Increase Force

12818.name: Yellow Talisman - Damage Transition
12818.description: Transfers a portion of damage you take onto your servitor while equipped. Effect does not stack with additional Talismans of the same type. Shadow Item that cannot be exchanged or dropped. Yellow Talisman of Damage Transition

12819.name: Recovery Spellbook for Combat Use
12819.description: Spellbook that restores a character's lowered Exp. at death. Usable only in combat. Recovery Item for Battlefield Use

12820.name: Blueprint - Summon Merchant Golem
12820.description: Blueprint needed to learn the Summon Merchant Golem skill. Used by Warsmiths. Required level: 52

12821.name: Accessory Life Stone - Level 80
12821.description: A mineral that has been petrified by a creature's physical or magical damage. Usable by characters level 80 and above when augmenting items.

12822.name: Accessory Life Stone - Level 82
12822.description: A mineral that has been petrified by a creature's physical or magical damage. Usable by characters level 82 and above when augmenting items.

12823.name: Casian's Blue Crystal
12823.description: A gift that Casian received as a child from the Water Dragon. Take it to Galate.

12824.name: Pathfinder Supplies (Level 1)

12835.description: Interesting hair accessory that looks like a teddy bear. Uses 2 hair accessory slots. Shadow Item that cannot be exchanged or dropped.

12852.name: Naga Storm - Molar {PvP} - Focus
